channel.title: Timed Message
channel.description: How do I make it so after 10 minutes a message pops up (like messages when you first log in; e.g.: Welcome to blahblahblahscape)? I want to put my own message tho :P not that

item.title: Timed Message
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

public void timedAnnouncer() { /*Method name*/ EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent( new Event() { /*Starting the event thread*/ public void execute(EventContainer c) { sM("[SERVER] - Remember to vote daily!"); } }, 50000); // Time between each announcement };
the 50000
thatâ€™s seconds correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Timed Message
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Make a new void,

public void timedAnnouncer() { /*Method name*/ EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent( new Event() { /*Starting the event thread*/ public void execute(EventContainer c) { sM("[SERVER] - Remember to vote daily!"); } }, 50000); // Time between each announcement };

Search for, case 121:

You see something like this.

replaceDoors();

Under it put

//Starts Announcer Event timedAnnouncer();

Read full topic
